name: RC Simulation 2.0
description: Drive all kinds of RC Cars, Boats, Rock Crawlers, Planes or Quadcopters on any of the 250+ Workshop Tracks. The game includes an in-game Track Editor and Vehicle Painter to create tons of scenarios and Paint schemes. RC Sim is made by a solo developer and still is in development.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Quad Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7xxx, 1024+ MB video card memory DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Any Windows Controller or Keyboard supported
